Content.Text:
Seating

Objects that end in "bench" or "chair"
enable people to <RED>sit on</RED> them.

<RED>Approach the seat from the front</RED>
and press the A Button to sit down. 
While sitting and doing nothing, press
the A Button again to stand back up.

Shipping Bin

Shipping bins can be used like the
shipping bin in front of Emma's house.

Place shipping bins in various spots
to make it easier to ship items.

Roads

You can lay out roads to create easy
paths for villagers to walk.

To keep the road clear for villagers,
nothing can be placed on a road.

Plaza

Amenities that end in "plaza" are ones
that you can <RED>place other amenities on</RED>.
Except for another plaza!

Arrange amenities on plazas in various
ways to create various settings.

Three-Wheeled Buggy

The three-wheeled buggy is a vehicle
that you can ride around in.
It zooms along at high speed to take
you where you want to go in a flash!
It can't travel in reverse, though.
Note: you can't keep it in Inventory.

Mechanical Lion

You can ride on the mechanical lion to
travel around.
It's an advanced model... it can go in
reverse too! And it's fast!

Note: you can't keep it in inventory!

Mechanical Panda

The mechanical panda is a vehicle that
you can ride on to travel around.
In order to ride, you need to have a
<GREEN>coin</GREEN>. (Riding costs one coin.)
Insert a coin to ride for a while.
Note: you can't keep it in inventory!

Arch-shaped Amenities

You can place other amenities
underneath arch-shaped amenities.
An <RED>arch can straddle a road</RED>.

But <RED>you cannot place tall amenities
under an arch</RED>.

Regular Field

Field for growing crops.
<RED>Crops grow a little bit better</RED>
in these fields than in gravel fields.

By carefully planning how you plant,
you might be able to grow large crops!

Soil Field

Field for growing crops.
<RED>Crops grow a little bit better</RED> in
these fields than in regular fields.

By carefully planning how you plant,
you might be able to grow giant crops!

Paddy

Paddies are for growing paddy crops
that don't grow in fields.

<RED>Use your watering can to fill the
paddy</RED>. If you put in enough, you
won't have to water for several days.

Beehive

If you put bees in the beehive, they
will <RED>make honey</RED>. After a few
days, you can collect the honey.

Warning! If you put the beehive in
your inventory, <RED>the bees will escape</RED>.

Mushroom Log

Sow mushroom seeds on the mushroom log
to <RED>grow mushrooms</RED>. You can
harvest them after a few days.

Warning! If you place the mushroom log
in your inventory while growing, the
<RED>mushroom seeds will be lost</RED>!

Farm Bell

Ring the farm bell to <RED>graze all
your animals</RED> or <RED>call all your
animals back to the barn</RED>.

Chicken Feed Box

This is just like the feed box in the
coop: you can <RED>put chicken feed in it</RED>.
One feed box can hold <BLUE>5</BLUE> units of feed.

Gardening Space

This amenity is for viewing as part
of the Gardening Tour.
You can <RED>place other amenities</RED> on top
of the gardening space to create an
attractive environment!
Note: once other objects are placed on
it, <RED>the garden space cannot be moved</RED>.

Hot Spring

By bathing in the hot spring, you can
<RED>restore your health</RED>.

Enjoy a leisurely, soothing soak in
the hot spring!

Propeller Jet Pack

When you put on the propeller jet
pack, you can <RED>fly through the sky</RED>!
It was invented by a genius long ago.

Fish Trap

Set a fish trap at a fishing point to
<RED>catch fish</RED>.

You have to <RED>wait a while</RED> before
a fish is caught, so leave the trap
alone for a while after placing it.
